pages.text: <thing>Energy/$ (red) is one of the basic <thing>alignments/$- the <thing>alignment/$ of a pure <thing>energy/$ beam.$(br2)<thing>Energy/$ will add <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/heat)heat/$ to heat machines and cables, at a rate of 100째C/power every 4 ticks, or 25째C/power/tick.$(br2)If it hits anything other
than a <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/heat)heat/$ machine, it will start a fire.$(br2)
<thing>Void-Energy/$ AKA <thing>Cold/$ will remove <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/heat)heat/$ from heat machines and cables, at a rate of -100째C/power every 4 ticks, or -25째C/power/tick.$(br2)
